content: marsh is a variation on another free pattern mallow 1 marsh features simple cap sleeves and a plain stockinette front while the back features an almost full-body lace pattern knit with just a few hanks of berroco modern cotton dk or balls of mantra marsh is fast and fun pattern to knit small error in chart in initial download **chart updated 6/12/2018** **spanish translation** provided by ravelry user justini is available here 2 finished measurements bust 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 length 18 18 19 19 20 20 20½ shown in size 38 with approximately 6 of ease purple modern cotton dk and in size 46 with approximately 4 of ease gray mantra yarn berroco modern cotton dk 100 grs 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 hanks #6633 viola berroco mantra 50 grs 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 hanks #4406 willow needles and notions straight needles size 6 4 00 mm or size to obtain gauge 2 st markers 1 st holder gauge 21 sts and 29 row = 4 in st st 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mallow-4 2 https //www felizypunto com/top-de-verano-marsh-patron/
